## ExplainAI | Python, Streamlit,Deta Space

  <a href="https://github.com/krmh04/ExplainAI" target="_blank">Code</a><br>    

 
- Developed a web application to quickly summarize large blocks of text and videos/podcasts
- It also allows the user to summarize the text from web links as well as from locally uploaded PDF files.
- Used the Open AI API and Deepgram API for summarizing/transcribing the text and the Courier Email API to send emails
